price: фараону и Хаману и Каруну, али су они рекли: „Чаробњак и лажов!“
arabic: إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَ وَقَٰرُونَ فَقَالُواْ سَٰحِرٞ كَذَّابٞ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ilā fir'ʿawna wahāmāna waqārūna faqālū sāḥirun kadhābun
